name: Garden of Seif: Curse of Gravehollow Peaks
storyline: Iris and Seth are tricked by a mischievous fairy godmother that leads into the cursed mountains where winter is eternal and travelers never return. The two rivals must work together to find a way out, but their escape will depend on the choices they make.
summary: Lost in the cursed mountains of Gravehollow Peaks, two rival assassins must set their differences aside and find a way home... unless something finds them first. A story-rich fantasy with magic, romance, and choices that matter.
